summary: Resolved 2 conflicted metadata files for PR #199 (feature/139-fileguard-sprint-2-issue-139). Both .claude-resolution.json and .conflict-info.json contained conflict markers between stale prior-session AI summaries that no longer applied to the current merge. The actual merge changes (agent-core.md, alert-queue.md, go.mod, go.sum) were already staged without conflicts.
strategyUsed: For .claude-resolution.json: wrote a fresh resolution summary for the current session rather than merging two stale prior-session descriptions that no longer apply. For .conflict-info.json: the file contained no conflict markers and already had correct current-session metadata (PR #199, feature/139 branch), so it was staged as-is.
